name: Dahu Catcha
description:
Dahu -- the main character in this game.
he is encouraged by grandma.
So assign to join the "Basket Catch Foods" game in harvest festival.

he will catch the most foods in limited time?

_______________

Game Rules

  • "Click"or "Drag" to move character.
  • Catch most foods possible in time limited.
    • Food type:
    • Tai (Millet dumpling)、Bundle of millet、Taro、Pork meat
  • Watch out red mushroom!! Those will reduce time.

_______________

Game Feature

  • multi-language supported.
    • Traditional Chinese
    • Japanese
    • English

_______________

Available and free on Google Play Store.
